Name: Zup! Arena
About the game: Zup! Arena is a multiplayer arcade game in which you have to fight with other players! Throw off all your opponents from the battlefield and become the 'King of the mountain'. Play alone or in a group with friends! Earn Zup-bucks for winning and participating in battles and use customization to make your character unique and the cutest! Fight on one of 6 unique arenas! Level up to get additional rewards and unique decorations of the game profile! - Fight alone among 8 players or play in a group - A unique battlefield - Customization items - Support for most controllers - Steam Achievements
Meta Title: Zup! Arena: Dec 20, 2018, Quiet River and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Zup! Arena? Check out the release date (Dec 20, 2018), developer insights from Quiet River, and a complete game summary.
